about_the_game:
Two games, two maps, two minigames!

A small taste of Cake Bash.
detailed_description:
Two games, two maps, two minigames!

A small taste of Cake Bash.

name: Cake Bash Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 550 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Fight to be the tastiest cake in Cake Bash! A frantic four player party game where adorable drawn-to-life cakes beat the crumbs out of each other. Demo Version!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Simplified Chinese*, Russian*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
